timeline.message: subtract usage by other application deployments from Quota
sum usage across tenant, not application
extract class for deployment quota calculation

timeline.bodyText: I don't understand why application is a parameter for .quotaUsage(...). Surely the app object knows about its own identity?
timeline.author: oyving

replies.bodyText:
An ApplicationId is not the identifier of an Application - that is the TenantAndApplicationId (which it knows).
An ApplicationId actually specifies an instance: so TenantAndApplicationId + InstanceName. I could have passed just the InstanceName, and in the quotaUsage methods reconstructed the ApplicationId - but it would be more code and didn't seem any clearer to me.
ApplicationId needs to be renamed to InstanceId, or perhaps TenantAndApplicationAndInstanceId, but I think that's a big refactor :-)
replies.author: andreer
